column4: I'm trying to find the line to add to my apt sources to be able to install java-package - anyone know?
I'm guessing it's the deb that contains make-jpkg ...
or your initial question was about adding repo lines right?
well /etc/apt/sources.list is where you would add it
I can't find what repo I need to add...
that howto is really old, year and a half, it is probably obselete
hrm - well then, back to the drawing board
do you need just the plugin, because I know some howtos for that
I just found the java6 jdk in Multiverse - maybe I'll give it a whirl
